examples: Turn that music down; it's too loud .
What was that? It sounded like a really loud sneeze.
a loud party that went on all night
definitions.label_groups: of a person, thing, event, etc.

definitions.definition: Having unpleasantly and tastelessly contrasting colours or patterns; gaudy .
examples: a loud style of dress; loud colors

definitions.definition: High-quality ; premium ; ( by extension ) having a strong or pungent odour indicating good quality.

main_definition: ( of a sound ) Of great intensity .
secondary_definitions: ( of a person, thing, event, etc. ) Noisy .
( of a person, event, etc. ) Not subtle or reserved , brash .
( of clothing, decorations, etc. ) Having unpleasantly and tastelessly contrasting colours or patterns; gaudy .
( of marijuana , slang ) High-quality ; premium ; ( by extension ) having a strong or pungent odour indicating good quality.
